header: This Does Mean That There Is Now No Condemnation For Those In Christ Jesus

verse: Therefore, there is now no condemnation for the ones in Christ Jesus.
For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus set you free from the law of sin and death!

header: For God Did What The Law Could Not Do, For Those Walking In The Spirit

verse: For the thing impossible for the Law, in that it was weak through the flesh, God did. Having sent His own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh, and for sin, He condemned sin in the flesh,
in order that the requirement of the Law might be fulfilled in us, the ones walking not in-accordance-with the flesh, but in accordance with the Spirit.

header: For The Way of The Flesh Is Death. But You Are Not In The Flesh, But In The Spirit

verse: For the ones being in accordance with the flesh are thinking the things of  the flesh, but the ones being in accordance with the Spirit, the things of the Spirit.
For the way-of-thinking of the flesh is death, but the way-of-thinking of the Spirit is life and peace.
Because the way-of-thinking of the flesh is hostility toward God; for it is not subject to the Law of God, for it is not even able.
And the ones being in the flesh are not able to please God.
But you are not in the flesh, but in the Spirit— since the Spirit of God is dwelling in you. But if anyone does not have the Spirit of Christ, this one is not of  Him.

header: And The Spirit Is True Life In Us Now, And Will Give Life To Our Mortal Bodies

verse: And if Christ is in you, the body is dead because of sin, but the Spirit is life because of righteousness.

And if the Spirit of the One having raised Jesus from the dead is dwelling in you, the One having raised Christ from the dead will also give-life-to your mortal bodies through His Spirit dwelling in you.

header: So We Are Debtors To The Spirit To Put To Death The Deeds of The Flesh And Live

verse: So then, brothers, we are debtors— not to the flesh, that we should be living in accordance with the flesh.
For if  you are living in accordance with the flesh, you are going-to die. But if by the Spirit you are putting-to-death the practices of the body, you will live.

header: For Those Being So Led By The Spirit Are The Adopted Children of God

verse: For all who are being led by the Spirit of God, these are sons of God.
For you did not receive a spirit of slavery again leading-to fear, but you received a Spirit of adoption by Whom we are crying-out “Abba! Father!”
The Spirit Himself bears-witness-with our spirit that we are children of God!

header: This Means We Are Joint-Heirs With Christ, Sharing His Suffering And Glory

verse: And if we are children, we are heirs also. We are heirs of God, and fellow-heirs of Christ, since we are suffering-with Him in order that we may also be glorified-with Him.
For I consider that the sufferings of the present time are not worthy to the glory destined to be revealed to us.

header: Creation Itself Groans To Share In Our Glory

verse: For the eager-expectation of the creation is awaiting the revelation of the sons of God.
For the creation was subjected to futility— not willingly, but because of the One having subjected it— in hope
that the creation itself also will be set-free from the slavery of  decay into the freedom of  the glory of the children of God.
For we know that the whole creation is groaning-together and suffering-birthpains-together until the present.

header: We Groan For The Redemption of Our Body

verse: And not only creation, but also ourselves having the firstfruit of the Spirit— we ourselves also are groaning within ourselves while eagerly-awaiting adoption, the redemption of our body.
For we were saved in hope. But hope being seen is not hope, for who hopes-for what he sees?
But since we hope-for what we do not see, we are eagerly-awaiting it with endurance.

header: The Spirit Groans To Help Us In Our Present Weakness

verse: And similarly also the Spirit helps our weakness. For we do not know what we should pray as we ought-to, but the Spirit Himself intercedes-for us with inexpressible groanings.
And the One searching our hearts knows what the mind of the Spirit is, because He is interceding for the saints in accordance with God.

header: This Means God Is Working All Things Together Toward Our Glorification

verse: And we know that all things are working-together for good for the ones loving God, the ones being called ones according to His purpose.
Because whom He foreknew, He also predestined to be similar-to-the-form of the image of His Son, so that He might be firstborn among many brothers.
And whom He predestined, these He also called. And whom He called, these He also declared-righteous. And whom He declared righteous, these He also glorified.

header: So What Shall We Say To All This? If God Is For Us, Who Will Condemn Us?

verse: Therefore, what shall we say to these things? If  God is for us, who is against us?
He Who indeed did not spare His own Son but handed Him over for us all, how will He not also with Him freely-give us all things?
Who will bring-a-charge against the chosen ones of God? God is the One declaring-righteous!
Who is the one who will condemn? Christ Jesus is the One having died, but more, having been raised, Who also is at the right hand of God, Who also intercedes for us!

header: Nothing Can Separate Us From Christ’s Love; We Are Conquerors Through Him

verse: What shall separate us from the love of Christ? Affliction, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or danger, or sword?
Just as it has been written [in Ps 44:22] that “For your sake we are being put-to-death the whole day. We were considered as sheep for slaughter”.
But in all these things we overwhelmingly-conquer through the One having loved us.
For I am convinced that neither death nor life, nor angels nor rulers, nor things present nor things coming, nor powers,
nor height nor depth, nor any other creation will be able to separate us from the love of God in Christ Jesus our Lord.
